website_summaries.verdict: A great budget option for a men's-specific leather glove when you want extra comfort and grip on the road.
pros: Well-constructed seams won't split with heavy use
Contains gel padding near the wrist for extra support while riding
cons: Moisture can affect the size of the leather fabric

customer_reviews.title: Please - save your hands - don’t buy this gloves
customer_reviews.text: Where do I start - Don’t buy them !!!!!!! Waste of money - The look good, they feel good, but that is where everything ends. They color dye will be all over your hands - 10-15 minutes to f good hand washing will fix. The so called leather is feather thin, offers no protection. You can see on the pictures - old 250 training bike In parking lot, routine maneuvers- 5 mile per hour drop and there is a huge hole In the glove - let’s not talk about my hand. This is an absolute disaster - not a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for! I have over 40 years of motorcycle experience and used hundreds of gloves. In fact, I’m a kind of a glove junkie. These are by far the cheapest and worst gloves I’ve ever used. On the first ride, I noticed that the palm section of the gloves had worn away exposing the un-died leather underneath. On the second, third and fourth ride the gloves continually left die on my hands which was very hard to remove. Keep in mind this was cold weather riding, I can’t imagine what what they would do on a hot day. These are unacceptable and junk gloves.
customer_reviews.author: MikeM

customer_reviews.title: These gloves are great
customer_reviews.text: I like to ride my bike in the cold. These gloves with stretchy knit gloves inside keep my hands warm. These gloves have the cinch strap on the inside so you can easily tighten them with the opposite hand. These gloves have a palm piece to give them extra durability and hard plastic over the knuckle. I wish i had found them sooner. I will be purchasing more pairs. THESE ARE GREAT GLOVES FOR RIDING
customer_reviews.author: Bryant M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Pair Of Gloves
customer_reviews.text: I bought these not for warmth, in fact the opposite. Here in Phoenix Az it can be hot as h on your hands. These work great for that. They fit great, and they grip well too. You do not get cramps trying to hang on to the throttle. Also I was just in an accident where a lady pulled out in front of me. I was going 50 mph, not sure how fast when I hit here drivers door but I flew over the car onto the pavement my left hand must have hit because the glove was ripped along the seem, however very much to my delight hand was not even scratched. Bought another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Raymie

customer_reviews.title: great value for the $!
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of gloves that were of very similar quality that I paid $90 for because they had a LOGO ON THEM. these are every bit as good for a fraction of the amount of money. I bought mine in a size smaller than I normally wear in gloves because I too read lots of reviews and I would have been fine with my normal size. I appreciate them being tight and fitting well so I would tell my friends go a size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: hockey#19

customer_reviews.title: No padding under the knuckle protectors...
customer_reviews.text: There is no padding under the knuckle protector, only thin cloth to hold it in place. I started to get painful rub areas on my left (clutch) hand after an hour of riding and shifting. By the time that I got back home, my middle knuckles were sore from the rubbing while shifting. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: EnjoyLife2016

customer_reviews.title: Not what expected...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered "Large" size and after receiving it was a perfect fit. Yesterday after completing a 400 mile ride the gloves feel like XL ot 2XL completely falling off my hand. Not sure if the fog (moiusture) affected the leather or what but will not wear them anymore. I bought other styles from this seller and had no quality issue.
customer_reviews.author: Xevier69

customer_reviews.title: Wonky, uncomfortable fit!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonky fit. Bunches up when you close your fist and pinches the heck out of your hand and finger skin! Some fingers fit great, some are waaay too long. Leather seems cheap and the dye wears off. Makes operating the controls on my bike super difficult. Forget your phone, they aren't gonna work. Also fit wierd with the cuffs on my motorcycle jacket. Pass on these, they're junk.
customer_reviews.author: mattyq

customer_reviews.title: have great but quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: These don't fit as well as my Icon gloves, but they cost twice what these do. They fit well, have great but quality for the price, and keep my hands relatively warm down to about 45 degrees. If I could suggest one improvement, it would be that they were able to be secured better at the wrist - I feel they may be easily pulled off in the event of an accident. That said - can't beat 'em for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: much better than the 'other' brand at half the price
customer_reviews.text: paid $80 for H-D gloves and bought these as a backup. gave up on the $80 ones and now wear these all the time. i have large hands and these fit well except the fingers are slightly long. the other brand had very long fingers but worse was the wrist was tiny - when grabbing the throttle or brake, the wrist strap would bust loose. lose the strap and literally the gloves would almost slip off. these are much better.
customer_reviews.author: billphoto

customer_reviews.title: Small wrists? Maybe go down a size.
customer_reviews.text: The tightness of the gloves around my hand and fingers seemed to be perfect but it was hard to tighted around my wrist - i have small wrists and theres only so much velcro. Overall still very happy with this purchase and the fit of them, just had to slightly modify for my own personal figure.
customer_reviews.author: Stove

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gloves !
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for high end riding gloves minus the high end price then look no further. These gloves are a GREAT value for the money ! Extremely well made and durable. I use them when I ride my BMW bike and they work great ! It will take you a little while to break them in. Once they are broke in they are very,very comfortable. You can`t go wrong with these. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED !
customer_reviews.author: AMP

customer_reviews.title: Fit problems
customer_reviews.text: I hope they hold up in the long run, but who knows now. I do have an issue with fit. One thumb is too short, the other too long. I trying to stretch the short one, the one that is too long will be OK. With motorcycle gloves fit is important since so many of the operating controls are at the hands. The right thumb does not want to stretch to the signal, high/low beam, and horn switches. Annoying...
customer_reviews.author: K. Schein

customer_reviews.title: Good product... No QA...
customer_reviews.text: Soft leather that felt good to the touch and the skin. First pair had a stitching issue on the wrist strap and I reqeusted a replacement which was quickly sent my way. The replacement pair had a small defect on the right palm but it was so insignificant that I decided to keep. The stitches on the wrist strap started coming loose upon first ride. It also left a color transfer on my hands that was hard to remove. Could it be that I received two defective pairs? Possible but I think is unlikely. I paid a little more but got another set at my local Harley dealer.
customer_reviews.author: Kleo

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Advertised for touch screen use, but they don't. Oh well, c'est la vie! Other than that are very nice gloves. Fit to size, and seem pretty durable. I use them for cooler weather (live in SE GA) early spring/late fall.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Vail

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a great quality glove for cheap!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these gloves for almost 2 weeks at this point. I bought them after hitting a groundhog on my motorized bicycle and getting my hands pretty badly torn up because of my fingerless gloves. I’ll be commuting over the winter too so I decided to get some cheap leather gloves. Now I don’t see any winter value in these gloves, but that’s a sacrifice I’m going to have to make. All-in-all these gloves have held up wonderfully so far, no rips or worn out spots yet. Size L fit perfectly for my larger hands, and the gloves broke in really quick.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Nadeau

customer_reviews.title: Motor cycle gloves
customer_reviews.text: brought these for my husband as a Christmas gift. He likes them and says that they fit him, says they are great motorycle gloves and will keep his hands warm while out riding
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Janes

customer_reviews.title: interior of the glove is not insulated will.
customer_reviews.text: just like the title, This is by far the cheapest 20 bucks glove you can get. it has some patting but is only one side. Not worth it save your money and buy a better will known brand. its just not very applicable.
customer_reviews.author: ShootAirsoftVideos

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gloves
customer_reviews.text: They do not work on my iPhone. However, I’ve had these gloves for over a year. They have 3000 plus miles of riding and show zero wear. Extremely comfortable even after 3+ hours in the saddle. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: PV santa fe

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable, didn’t take long to break in
customer_reviews.text: These are a really good quality glove set. I drive a scooter that goes 50 mph+ in florida, and sometimes in the winter it does get a bit chilly. Without the gloves, my hands would feel numb from the wind chill, which is definitely not safe. These gloves will keep your hands safe and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Zapin

customer_reviews.title: Leather Gloves.
customer_reviews.text: After seeing the gloves they are not what I was expecting. I did not really know the knuckle padding would be so pronounced and noticeable. Quality fair. Made in Pakistan. I decided to keep after learning I would be charged $7.14 to ship them back and that would be deducted from my refund. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Carter

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Dont waste your time nor money.
customer_reviews.text: Way expensive. Defective item sent. You would thibk that amount of money they charge that they would check the product before sending it. Too much of a hassle to ship it back because they messed up. It's just a complete headache.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son for Christmas. He loves them. Said that the fingerless gloves cause his hands to freeze in the cold weather, but these not only keep his fingers warm, they are flexible and do not hinder his ability to shift or brake.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Raines

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre Quality
customer_reviews.text: Don't even make good work gloves. Cheap leather, poor fit, definitely not gonna offer protection during a motorcycle slide or crash. Used them for the first time to move some lumber since they didn't make adequate riding gloves and they already fell apart after just 1 use.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Dmeza

customer_reviews.title: good quality but stains my hands.
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are a pretty good fit but the fingers are a bit too long for my hands. I've worn them twice so far and both times they left a black stain on my hands. Hopefully that will go away soon.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne R Speer

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Gloves look and feel good. Comfortable, soft leather. I wanted leather with knuckle protection and these for the bill very nicely. The cut and the fit are pretty good. Sizing was perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: AANSAR

customer_reviews.title: Fit Great
customer_reviews.text: Gloves fit great. I'm a big Guy, ordered the XXl size. Initialy they were a little tight, but after a day or so the gloves broke in nicely. I drive a Tri Axel for a construction company and use them daily. So far they are holding up and are comfortable ! Would buy again !
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Bolduc

customer_reviews.title: A durable, summer glove!
customer_reviews.text: The stitching on these gloves are an improvement compared to other summer gloves. Perfect fit in the XL size, and they are thin enough to wear on a warm day. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: W. Cleland

customer_reviews.title: not winter
customer_reviews.text: They're good gloves for the summer, but winter is a totally different story. I tried to ride my motorcycle in 45 degree weather and I had to stop change gloves. My hands were freezing.
customer_reviews.author: Frank johns

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Fit
customer_reviews.text: I used the sizing guide and the gloves fit perfectly. I did not see any loose or broken treads upon inspection. Overall the quality seemed to be there. Currently I am riding in 60 degree weather and my fingers do not feel any cold. I think for the price these gloves are a really good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Nice glove but stitching on one glove tore within first week of use. I just haven’t bothered to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth J. Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Good glove
customer_reviews.text: Good fit for my hands. Could be a little warmer. Rode in 32° weather and did great for about 20 min. Then fingers just got cold. Hour long ride and no frost bite.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: 10 out of 10
customer_reviews.text: For a 25 dollar pair of riding gloves these work excellent the knuckles could be hard but the padding is hard so it's not bad real goat leather(I work with goat and steer hide leather daily) I'd say 10out of 10 for the leather same for stitching they are a bit stiff on the in between spots on the fingers but that's nothing that time dont fix all and all I would wear these everyday I need gloves unless I'm doi g offroad
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Dean

customer_reviews.title: solid glove
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable semi durable glove. Discoloration and wear on first trip. Just normal riding. No holes and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: D. Maiers

customer_reviews.title: Still breaking these in but so far so good. A little thick on the palm and noticeable ...
customer_reviews.text: Still breaking these in but so far so good. A little thick on the palm and noticeable when operating the clutch but expect them to bed in nicely.
customer_reviews.author: ian murray

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great price but color bleeds a lot
customer_reviews.text: The fit and comfort of these gloves is great. Padding and contours are well stitched. However, even after several months of riding the inside still stains my hands black everytime I ride. I have started wearing liners to avoid scrubbing the dye off.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Matuszak

customer_reviews.title: Decent Gloves but would not by again.
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortablely warm. Touch screen not very good. Not as soft and playable as I would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: I am not a happy camper.  Live & learn.
customer_reviews.text: Used one time I see the stitching in the fingers beginning to unravel. The palms are already worn, one time use and the dye is gone showing raw brown leather. Very disappointed and defiantly not going to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dom Dellaripa

customer_reviews.title: Yes, we will recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: It is soft, protect well against wind. The only con is that it is not touch screen friendly at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nora C Villegas

customer_reviews.title: Medium and large size are the same
customer_reviews.text: About 6 months ago I bought the large size of these gloves and they were too big. I just bought the medium size and they fit the same as the large
customer_reviews.author: Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Need to be worn in and then good to go
customer_reviews.text: Little stiff. Need to be worn in and then good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great after broken in.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like these at first because they looked cheap. Now they are my favorite because of comfort. Give them a chance to wear. The touchscreen sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Kamal

customer_reviews.title: Get gift
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed they did not fit . I did the measurements as instructed and added a 1/2 inch. So I ordered as directed. But I did like the gloves. Just need to return and reorder .
customer_reviews.author: connie ballard

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband for his birthday and he loves them. Perfect for cold weather, but might not keep your hands warm enough in the winter. Overall super happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Abbi

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic gloves
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I really like them. They fit good and feel good. Very pleased with these gloves.
customer_reviews.author: LarryG

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: Overall, no major complaints. I have used it over a year now and it worked well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: So far the gloves do what I ordered them to do, use my cell, keep my hands warm, n I'm able to feel my grips.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Good protection but limited dexterity
customer_reviews.text: These gloves seemed sturdy enough and had good knuckle coverage but I returned them because the seams on the fingers were too bulky to allow me to operate the turn signal on my motorcycle.
customer_reviews.author: goldengirl

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The first day I wore these I get a dang sweet gum while letting off the throttle and spun out. Not a single hole or any major marketing which kept my palms nice and smooth!
customer_reviews.author: Zachery B

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic price, gloves are a little "thicker" than your average motorcycle gloves, feels like they'll do well in Fall or colder weather.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Cool gloves
customer_reviews.text: My son needed gloves for a project and these worked out great. I would definitely recommen.
customer_reviews.author: ryork3521

customer_reviews.title: Wast of money.
customer_reviews.text: After 1 hr of riding I took the gloves off and my hands where black. Tried scrubbing it off but it dyed my hands black.
customer_reviews.author: Medel

customer_reviews.title: Good armored gloves
customer_reviews.text: These fit like a glove. The thumb is a little long but that's okay. As long as you take the measurement correctly you should be able to find your size. These don't quite have the same fit as work or nitrel gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Steve W.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Feel stiff and the stitching isn't great. Have more of a plastic feel than leather.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse James

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad glove almost feel cheap but comfortable and warm for night ride that are 40 degrees
customer_reviews.author: Charles p.

customer_reviews.title: Great value gor money.............hands down!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and comfortable gloves. I have very large hands and ordered XXL size. They fit perfect and with the velcro fastening, they stay snug and don't slide down my hand. Quality is of a high standard. Reinforcing fits nicely too. Would recommend to any one wanting a motorcycle sport glove. PS these are not a winter glove.
customer_reviews.author: Zak Bristow

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wear these whenever I am out on the motorcycle and they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dan H

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic gloves right size
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves hands down n covered,right size for a change
customer_reviews.author: wildemanne

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable gloves  at excellent price
customer_reviews.text: these gloves are very comfortable and true to size, good quality material
customer_reviews.author: Giuseppe P.

customer_reviews.title: Great riding gloves
customer_reviews.text: Love these gloves, they run a little big but that is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Measurements are off.
customer_reviews.text: I went off the measurements that were given and they were still too big. Go down a size after measuring. I like my riding gloves to not be too loose. Even after being strapped they are floppy. Decent quality though.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Gearing

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Not super warm, and the knuckle protection is about 1 full knuckle too slim (despite the glove otherwise fitting) and causes discomfort while riding. Didn't rate touch screen because I haven't tried to use that feature
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Good buy so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so goof. I've had them for a little while and I've had no issues with them. I don't say this much but I would actually buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Redrucka69

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves, I would buy again if I ever need a new pair
customer_reviews.author: Friendly neighborhood Spider-Man

customer_reviews.title: Shop for softer leather
customer_reviews.text: The leather seems to have mildew on gloves cleaned them up and wore for 8 miles on a ride and very uncomfortable to me.
customer_reviews.author: James M Fallen

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Husband really likes these gloves. With the hard knuckle and soft leather, they wear comfortably while he is riding his motorcycle. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Description says black but is really synthetic leather dyed black Die is very cheap came off of gloves on 1st day and stained my skin
customer_reviews.author: Brandon C.

customer_reviews.title: You pay for what you get
customer_reviews.text: The padding on he knuckles is cheap, my Icon gloves are worth it compared to these things. They are like the Chinese cheap version of icon gloves. I'm not going to be riding in these things because I'm scared the gloves wouldn't protect me properly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: Came with the barely any velcro to tighten on wrist and they actually sewed a piece of the scratchy plastic part of velcro on the inside of the glove.
customer_reviews.author: starrose

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for cool morning motorcycle rides to work. Work just fine at 45-50°.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: These gloves ripped along the thumb seam during my first long ride.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these gloves. I was on a long ride from Salt Lake City (northern Utah) to southern Utah with a group of riders. (1) the "touch screen" fingers don't work, and (2) they ripped along the thumb seam. Poor quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality material
customer_reviews.text: I really like the gloves. I got XL but they seemed a bit snug for XL. Maybe I'm just a uge handed guy IDK....
customer_reviews.author: Louis B.

customer_reviews.title: They gloves are comfortable and kinda stylish and yet a perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: They gloves are comfortable and kinda stylish and yet a perfect fit, so just off of that I’ll rate them legit! Perfect for riding and just n case u need to split. If u don’t have a helmet n gloves then u need to quit!!
customer_reviews.author: Ezekiel Fonseca

customer_reviews.title: Black coloring is coming off.
customer_reviews.text: I think these gloves look like they are nice BUT they stain my hands black and the black is wearing off on the outside of the gloves and exposing brown leather.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne H.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good good quality for the price. Fit is true. Not for summer riding! Will recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KeepItHonest

customer_reviews.title: Not for the cold
customer_reviews.text: These fit well and are comfortable, even for long rides. However, they are not for cold weather. Your fingers will freeze and fall off mid-ride. Excellent summer to slightly cool weather.
customer_reviews.author: Dezzy

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: These are great gloves!! They fit my caveman hand well and are assembled really well. Very soft and comfortable right out of the box. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Good quality gloves
customer_reviews.text: Leather quality is good, and it fits my hand perfectly with no touch screen, which forces me to take it off every time I need to use my mobile. It kept my hands worm but we are still 12C, hopefully it keeps it the same when less.
customer_reviews.author: Wael Salama

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, if you want good form fitting gloves, just go to the local store and pick up some quality gloves. you wanna protect your hands, just go spend the $60 on some decent ones. These are reverse engineered chinese knock offs.
customer_reviews.author: John Bryant

customer_reviews.title: very nice gloves.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this on a commute to work everyday for a couple of months, very nice gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew D. Splechter

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: sewing in forefingers left knots on inside of glove at finger tips. very uncomfortable. Try to turn inside out and trim but didn't work. get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Dan N.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great Condition premium leather. Very comfortable to wear with knuckle shielding. Padding on the palms were not as ruggidized as I expected in the picture but more than adequate and makes ridding easier.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Good leather, size was good and great price for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: J Buffalo Head

customer_reviews.title: Order larger size.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work on touchscreen. I don’t use touchscreen while riding or would have returned. I ordered a xxl size and they are very tight. I assume they will loosen up with time. Wish I had ordered xxxl now.order
customer_reviews.author: Michael Chapman

customer_reviews.title: It’s no 100% leather, neither 50%
customer_reviews.text: 60% synthetic 40% leather (or less) regular quality especially for the price
customer_reviews.author: Sincho

customer_reviews.title: awesome gloves really happy with this pair of gloves give ...
customer_reviews.text: awesome gloves really happy with this pair of gloves give me a lot protection against debris on the road and cold/hot air and the price simply marvelous
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves were just what I was looking for. A little right at first but after wearing them they are perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Good glove
customer_reviews.text: Good starter glove and good fit. Durability may be in question but overall a good buy for the money
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Great glove for the money
customer_reviews.text: I like how these gloves block the wind and have been very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, real leather, inexpensive,
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, real leather, inexpensive, not sure how long they will last as I have had them only for a few hours but I would buy them again
customer_reviews.author: ABear

customer_reviews.title: Wrist area is huge and you can not use your touchscreen on your phone with them
customer_reviews.text: Wrist area is huge and you can not use your touchscreen on your phone with them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: very wide on the cuff, not a sporty fit at all
customer_reviews.author: Narcis

customer_reviews.title: Spring & fall gloves
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit,love it, Real leather! But I still need gloves for colder weather. Sorry nothing bad to say.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy012a

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly and product was as expected. These look great and have padding in the right places.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Ohnstad

customer_reviews.title: poor quality, black faded off
customer_reviews.text: poor quality, black smudged off the first time they were worn, thread is coming off at the fingers creating holes
customer_reviews.author: Douglas MacCartney

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The color does rub off on your hands and in 10 days or less a layer was coming off the palms of the gloves. Spend more and ones with better quality dye.
customer_reviews.author: DougL

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The glove itself fits comfort but the Comfortless while riding is no bueno. You can’t really twist the throttle properly.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Del Real

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny !!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and quality !! Wouldn't work with my touch screen phone though..
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Bennett

customer_reviews.title: good inexpensive gloves
customer_reviews.text: seem to be good gloves. runs a little on the bigger side. I wear a large and ordered a large and they fit well enough to use the controls, but I wish they fit a little tighter. also, they only extend slightly past the wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit Well felt good, But First time they got wet they molded.
customer_reviews.author: Chancey

product_meta.title: Men's Premium Leather Street Motorcycle Protective Cruiser Biker Gel Gloves L
feature_bullets: Made of top quality Aniline Goat leather.
